execution_quality: The agent made edits and ran tests but the implementation did not resolve the core issue—status changes continued to interfere with the meter output, suggesting the fix addressed symptoms rather than root causes.
work_category: Terminal UI troubleshooting where user reported that a two-line display approach fails to clear properly, requesting exploration of richer UI libraries or sparklines.
summary: The agent attempted to fix a terminal UI display problem by making code edits and running tests, but the implementation did not resolve the underlying issue of status messages interfering with meter output. The user's follow-up indicated that while the volume now displays, separate status prints continue to corrupt the display line, suggesting the fix was incomplete or misdirected.
follow_up_pattern: User reported the problem persisted with new details: volume showing on meter but status messages still printing separately and disrupting the output line.
